name: WP-PostViews Plus widget
author: flyaga li

sections.description:
This is a widget based on WP-PostViews Plus plugin by Richer Yang (https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-postviews-plus). Adds a WP-PostViews Plus widget to display most viewed posts and/or pages By User Or Bot on your sidebar.

The WP-PostViews Plus plugin is a great way to Display How Many Times A Post Had Been Viewed By User Or Bot. Unfortunately, integrating the WP-PostViews Plus plugin into your blog’s sidebar can be a problem, espectially for none technical bloggers. The WP-PostViews Plus Widget makes integrating the WP-PostViews Plus plugin into your blog sidebar a lot easier. There’s no need to edit any template code.

version: 1.0

release date: 2009-02-14

website: http://www.gofunnow.com

plugin url: https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-postviews-plus-widget/

        http://www.gofunnow.com/wordpress/plugins/wp-postviews-plus-widget.htm

download url: https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-postviews-plus-widget.zip

email:flyaga@163.com
sections.installation:
1. first install WP-PostViews Plus plugin from https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-postviews-plus, you can get how to install and use it from it’s readme.txt
  2. then Upload ‘wp-postviews-plus-widget’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin ‘WP-PostViews Plus widget’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. In your blog’s admin system goto Presentation > Widgets
  5. Drag and drop the widget to a convenient place in your sidebar
